birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国江苏省苏州市吴县
birth_place.en: Wu County, Suzhou, Jiangsu Province, Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国天津市

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，战后赴台协助建立中共台湾省工委学工委并担任书记，因光明报案爆发后返回中国大陆，在天津大学任教直至退休。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party who went to Taiwan after the war to help establish the Student Work Committee of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Working Committee and served as its secretary. He returned to mainland China after the outbreak of the Guangming Daily incident and taught at Tianjin University until his retirement.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省苏州市下辖的县，为徐懋德的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Suzhou, Jiangsu Province, and the birthplace of Xu Maode.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德曾就读并短暂任教的中学。
description.en: The middle school where Xu Maode studied and later briefly taught.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德于1938年至1942年就读的大学。
description.en: The university Xu Maode attended from 1938 to 1942.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德的师长，对其思想左倾产生重要影响，并介绍其加入新四军。
description.en: Xu Maode's teacher who had a significant leftist influence on him and introduced him to the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德的弟弟，与他一同加入中国共产党。
description.en: Xu Maode's younger brother, who joined the Chinese Communist Party with him.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德的妻子，与他一同在苏州进行中共地下工作。
description.en: Xu Maode's wife, who worked with him in the CCP underground in Suzhou.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国共产党台湾省工作委员会书记，徐懋德赴台后协助其工作。被捕后叛变，试图诱捕徐懋德。
description.en: Then-secretary of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Working Committee, whom Xu Maode assisted after arriving in Taiwan. He defected after being arrested and attempted to entrap Xu Maode.

nodes.id: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会学生工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会学生工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共在台湾的地下组织之一，主要负责在学校中发展成员，由徐懋德担任书记。
description.en: One of the CCP's underground organizations in Taiwan, primarily responsible for recruiting members in schools, with Xu Maode serving as secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在台湾的省级地下组织，领导学生工作委员会等下属机构。
description.en: The provincial-level underground organization of the Chinese Communist Party in Taiwan, which led subordinate bodies such as the Student Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共地下党员，受徐懋德派遣成立外围组织“新民主同志会”。
description.en: An underground member of the CCP, dispatched by Xu Maode to establish the peripheral organization 'New Democratic Comrades Association'.

description.zh-cn: 由陈炳基在徐懋德指示下成立的中共外围组织，用于吸收台湾青年。
description.en: A peripheral organization of the CCP established by Chen Bingji under Xu Maode's instructions to recruit Taiwanese youth.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，青年时期曾被吸收加入新民主同志会，并由徐懋德监誓加入中国共产党。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China, who in his youth was recruited into the New Democratic Comrades Association and was sworn into the Chinese Communist Party by Xu Maode.

description.zh-cn: 被吸收加入新民主同志会的人员之一。
description.en: One of the individuals recruited into the New Democratic Comrades Association.

description.zh-cn: 被吸收加入新民主同志会的人员之一。
description.en: One of the individuals recruited into the New Democratic Comrades Association.

description.zh-cn: 因中共地下刊物《光明报》曝光而引发的国民党政府对中共在台地下组织的大规模破获事件，导致台湾省工委第一次瓦解。
description.en: A large-scale crackdown by the KMT government on the CCP's underground organizations in Taiwan, triggered by the exposure of the underground publication 'Guangming Daily'. It led to the first collapse of the Taiwan Provincial Working Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共地下党员，在徐懋德潜返大陆后接替其领导学工委，后在光明报案中被捕。
description.en: An underground member of the CCP who took over the leadership of the Student Work Committee after Xu Maode fled to the mainland, and was later arrested in the Guangming Daily incident.

description.zh-cn: 中共党员，在师范大学发展组织。徐懋德在潜返大陆前曾告知其危险。
description.en: A CCP member who developed the organization at National Taiwan Normal University. Xu Maode warned him of the danger before fleeing to the mainland.

description.zh-cn: 中共地下党员，在光明报案中与李水井一同被捕。
description.en: An underground member of the CCP, arrested along with Li Shuijing in the Guangming Daily incident.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德从台湾返回中国大陆后长期任教的大学。
description.en: The university where Xu Maode taught for a long time after returning to mainland China from Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德于1920年12月31日出生于江苏省苏州市吴县。
description.en: Xu Maode was born in Wu County, Suzhou, Jiangsu Province on December 31, 1920.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德于1936年至1938年就读于海门中学。
description.en: Xu Maode studied at Haimen Middle School from 1936 to 1938.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德于1938年至1942年就读于交通大学土木系。
description.en: Xu Maode studied in the Civil Engineering Department of Jiaotong University from 1938 to 1942.

description.zh-cn: 在海门中学就读期间，徐懋德受师长邱汉生影响思想左倾，并由其介绍加入中国共产党相关组织。
description.en: During his studies at Haimen Middle School, Xu Maode was influenced by his teacher Qiu Hansheng, became left-leaning, and was introduced by him to join organizations related to the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1942年，徐懋德受师长影响加入中国共产党。
description.en: In 1942, influenced by his teacher, Xu Maode joined the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋义是徐懋德的弟弟。
description.en: Xu Maoyi is Xu Maode's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 顾孟琴是徐懋德的妻子。
description.en: Gu Mengqin is Xu Maode's wife.

relationships.source: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会学生工作委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 学生工作委员会是中国共产党台湾省工作委员会的下属机构。
description.en: The Student Work Committee was a subordinate body of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Working Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会学生工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 1948年至1950年，徐懋德担任中共台湾省工委学工委书记。
description.en: From 1948 to 1950, Xu Maode served as the Secretary of the Student Work Committee of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Working Committee.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德赴台后，协助时任台湾省工委书记蔡孝干建立学生工作委员会。
description.en: After arriving in Taiwan, Xu Maode assisted the then-secretary of the Taiwan Provincial Working Committee, Cai Xiaogan, in establishing the Student Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德派遣陈炳基成立外围组织“新民主同志会”。
description.en: Xu Maode dispatched Chen Bingji to establish the peripheral organization 'New Democratic Comrades Association'.

description.zh-cn: 陈炳基受徐懋德派遣成立了“新民主同志会”。
description.en: Chen Bingji founded the 'New Democratic Comrades Association' under the dispatch of Xu Maode.

description.zh-cn: 李登辉被吸收加入新民主同志会。
description.en: Lee Teng-hui was recruited into the New Democratic Comrades Association.

description.zh-cn: 林如堉被吸收加入新民主同志会。
description.en: Lin Ruyu was recruited into the New Democratic Comrades Association.

description.zh-cn: 李苍降被吸收加入新民主同志会。
description.en: Li Cangjiang was recruited into the New Democratic Comrades Association.

description.zh-cn: 徐懋德曾为李登辉监誓，使其加入中国共产党。
description.en: Xu Maode administered the oath for Lee Teng-hui to join the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 光明报案的爆发导致中共台湾省工委的地下组织被大规模破获，面临第一次瓦解。
description.en: The outbreak of the Guangming Daily Incident led to a large-scale crackdown on the underground organizations of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Working Committee, resulting in its first collapse.

description.zh-cn: 1950年1月，蔡孝干因光明报案首次落网。
description.en: In January 1950, Cai Xiaogan was arrested for the first time in connection with the Guangming Daily Incident.

description.zh-cn: 蔡孝干在落网脱逃后，刊登启事试图诱捕徐懋德，此事让徐懋德察觉到危险，并最终决定潜返大陆。
description.en: After being arrested and escaping, Cai Xiaogan published a notice in an attempt to entrap Xu Maode. This incident made Xu Maode aware of the danger and ultimately led to his decision to flee back to the mainland.

description.zh-cn: 在决定潜返大陆前，徐懋德告知李水井面临的危险，并将学工委的领导权交给他。
description.en: Before deciding to flee to the mainland, Xu Maode informed Li Shuijing of the impending danger and handed over the leadership of the Student Work Committee to him.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会学生工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 1950年2月，徐懋德潜返大陆，将学工委交由李水井领导。
description.en: In February 1950, Xu Maode fled to the mainland, leaving the Student Work Committee under the leadership of Li Shuijing.

description.zh-cn: 1950年5月10日，李水井因光明报案被捕，并导致学工委组织被进一步破获。
description.en: On May 10, 1950, Li Shuijing was arrested in connection with the Guangming Daily Incident, leading to further disruption of the Student Work Committee organization.

description.zh-cn: 1950年5月10日，吴思汉与李水井一同被捕。
description.en: On May 10, 1950, Wu Sihan was arrested along with Li Shuijing.

description.zh-cn: 1950年潜返大陆后，徐懋德进入天津大学建筑系任教，直至退休。
description.en: After fleeing back to the mainland in 1950, Xu Maode joined the Department of Architecture at Tianjin University as a professor and taught there until his retirement.
